apcs.gameofsticks.core

Class Lobby

  • java.lang.Object
    • apcs.gameofsticks.core.Lobby
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Holds clients while they are waiting for a match.
